trans-unit.source: 2019 update:
trans-unit.target: 2019年的更新。

trans-unit.source: FormData support starts from following desktop browsers versions.
trans-unit.target: FormData 支持从以下桌面浏览器版本开始。

trans-unit.target: HTML

trans-unit.source: PHP
trans-unit.target: PHP

trans-unit.source: Ajax post and upload file is possible. I'm using jQuery $.ajax function to load my files. I tried to use the XHR object but could not get results on the server side with PHP.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用Ajax发布和上传文件。我正在使用 jQuery $.ajax 函数加载文件。我尝试使用XHR对象，但无法在PHP的服务器端获得结果。

trans-unit.source: An AJAX upload is indeed possible with XMLHttpRequest(). No iframes necessary. Upload progress can be shown.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XMLHttpRequest() 确实可以进行AJAX上传。无需iframe。可以显示上传进度。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, you must create a FormData object, empty or from (serialized? - $('#yourForm').serialize()) existing form, and then attach the input file.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，您必须创建一个FormData对象，该对象为空或从现有表格（serialized？- $('#yourForm').serialize()) ，然后附加输入文件。

trans-unit.source: Can I use the following jQuery code to perform file upload using POST method of an ajax request ?
trans-unit.target: 我可以使用下面的jQuery代码来执行文件上传,使用Ajax请求的POST方法吗?

trans-unit.source: Chrome 7+
trans-unit.target: Chrome 7+

trans-unit.source: Demo: http://jsfiddle.net/anas/6v8Kz/7/embedded/result/
trans-unit.target: 演示：http : //jsfiddle.net/anas/6v8Kz/7/embedded/result/

trans-unit.source: Detailed documentation can be found here: http://anasthecoder.blogspot.ae/2014/12/multi-file-select-preview-without.html
trans-unit.target: 可以在这里找到详细的文档：http : //anasthecoder.blogspot.ae/2014/12/multi-file-select-preview-without.html

trans-unit.target: 扩展片段

trans-unit.source: File upload is <strike>not</strike> possible through AJAX.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上传文件是</font></font><strike><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">不是</font></font></strike><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">有可能通过AJAX。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Firefox 4.0+
trans-unit.target: Firefox 4.0以上

trans-unit.source: First let's us create an HTML file to add the following form file element as shown below.

trans-unit.source: For details see: Answer https://stackoverflow.com/a/4943774/873282 to question jQuery Upload Progress and AJAX file upload.

trans-unit.source: For more detail, see MDN link.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参见MDN链接。

trans-unit.source: For your case, these very possible. I will take you step by step how you can upload a file to the server using AJAX jquery.
trans-unit.target: 对于你的情况,这些是非常可能的。我将带你一步一步的带你了解如何使用AJAX jquery上传一个文件到服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Have a form in which you move the INPUT:File element to.
trans-unit.target: 有一个表格,你可以将INPUT:File元素移动到。

trans-unit.source: Have an event handler registered for the iframe's load event to parse the response.
trans-unit.target: 为iframe的加载事件注册一个事件处理程序来解析响应。

trans-unit.source: Here is more developed snippet with error handling and additional json sending
trans-unit.target: 这里是更多的开发的代码段,包含错误处理和额外的json发送。

trans-unit.source: Here is more information: - How to upload a file using jQuery.ajax and FormData - Uploading files via jQuery, object FormData is provided and no file name, GET request
trans-unit.target: 下面是详细信息： - 如何上传使用jQuery.ajax和FORMDATA文件 - 上传文件通过jQuery，提供FORMDATA对象，并没有文件名，GET请求

trans-unit.source: I have been googling around, but what I found was a plugin while in my plan I do not want to use it. At least for the moment.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在谷歌搜索,但我发现的是一个插件,而在我的计划中我不想使用它。至少目前来说是这样。

trans-unit.source: I have handled these in a simple code. You can download a working demo from here
trans-unit.target: 我已经用简单的代码处理了这些。您可以从此处下载有效的演示

trans-unit.source: I have implemented a multiple file select with instant preview and upload after removing unwanted files from preview via ajax.
trans-unit.target: 我已经实现了一个多文件选择,通过ajax从预览中删除不需要的文件后,即时预览和上传。

trans-unit.source: I'm pretty late for this but I was looking for an ajax based image uploading solution and the answer I was looking for was kinda scattered throughout this post. The solution I settled on involved the FormData object. I assembled a basic form of the code I put together. You can see it demonstrates how to add a custom field to the form with fd.append() as well as how to handle response data when the ajax request is done.
trans-unit.target: 我已经很晚了,但我一直在寻找一个基于ajax的图片上传解决方案,而我所寻找的答案在这篇帖子中也是比较分散的。我确定的解决方案涉及到了FormData对象。我组装了一个基本形式的代码放在一起。你可以看到它演示了如何用fd.append()给表单添加一个自定义字段,以及如何在ajax请求完成后处理响应数据。

trans-unit.source: IE 10+
trans-unit.target: IE 10+

trans-unit.source: If it is possible, do I need to fill data part? Is it the correct way? I only POST the file to the server side.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，是否需要填写 data 部分？这是正确的方法吗？我只将文件发布到服务器端。

trans-unit.source: If you want to upload file using AJAX here is code which you can use for file uploading.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使用AJAX上传文件,这里是你可以用来上传文件的代码。

trans-unit.source: Iframes is no longer needed for uploading files through ajax. I've recently done it by myself. Check out these pages:
trans-unit.target: 通过ajax上传文件时,Iframes已经不需要了。最近我自己也做了一下。看一下这些页面。

trans-unit.source: In case you are working with php here's a way to handle the upload that includes making use of both of the custom fields demonstrated in the above html.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用php,这里有一个处理上传的方法,包括使用上面html中的两个自定义字段。

trans-unit.source: In case you want to do it like that:
trans-unit.target: 万一你想这样做的话。

trans-unit.source: In server side you can read original file name (and other info) which is automatically included to request.
trans-unit.target: 在服务器端,你可以读取原始文件名(和其他信息),这些信息会自动包含在请求中。

trans-unit.target: 当然,你可能会想做一些验证,比如检查你处理的是哪种文件类型之类的东西,但这是你的想法。

trans-unit.target: 简单上传表格

trans-unit.source: The result will post to the frame, and then you can just send the fetched data up a level to the image tag you want with something like:
trans-unit.target: 结果将发布到框架中,然后你可以将获取的数据向上一级发送至你想要的图像标签,类似于这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: Then send the form data object to server.
trans-unit.target: 然后将表单数据对象发送至服务器。

trans-unit.source: There you are done . View more
trans-unit.target: 到此为止。查看更多

trans-unit.source: This solutions should work on all major browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这个解决方案应该可以在所有主流浏览器上运行。

trans-unit.source: To get all your form inputs, including the type="file" you need to use FormData object. you will be able to see the formData content in the debugger -> network ->Headers after you will submit the form.
trans-unit.target: 要获取所有表单输入，包括type =“ file”，您需要使用FormData对象。提交表单后，您将能够在调试器->网络->标头中查看formData内容。

trans-unit.source: UPDATE
trans-unit.target: UPDATE

trans-unit.source: Updated the answer and cleaned it up. Use the getSize function to check size or use getType function to check types. Added progressbar html and css code.
trans-unit.target: 更新了答案,清理了一下。使用getSize函数检查大小或使用getType函数检查类型。增加了进度条html和css代码。

trans-unit.source: Upload html:
trans-unit.target: 上传html。

trans-unit.source: Upload.php
trans-unit.target: Upload.php

trans-unit.source: Use FormData. It works really well :-) ...
trans-unit.target: 使用FormData。它非常好用:-)...

trans-unit.source: Use a hidden iframe and set your form's target to that iframe's name. This way, when the form is submitted, only the iframe will be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个隐藏的iframe,并将表单的目标设置为iframe的名称。这样,当表单提交后,只有iframe会被刷新。

trans-unit.source: Using FormData is the way to go as indicated by many answers. here is a bit of code that works great for this purpose. I also agree with the comment of nesting ajax blocks to complete complex circumstances. By including e.PreventDefault(); in my experience makes the code more cross browser compatible.
trans-unit.target: 使用FormData是一个很好的方法,正如很多人的回答所指出的那样。我也同意嵌套ajax块来完成复杂的情况下的评论。通过包含e.PreventDefault();,根据我的经验,这使得代码更多的是跨浏览器兼容。

trans-unit.source: Using HTML5 file uploads with AJAX and jQuery
trans-unit.target: 使用AJAX和jQuery上传HTML5文件

trans-unit.source: Using pure js it is easier
trans-unit.target: 使用纯js比较容易

trans-unit.source: We can also append a File or Blob directly to the FormData object.
trans-unit.target: 我们也可以直接将文件或Blob附加到FormData对象中。

trans-unit.source: With XHR2, File upload through AJAX is supported. E.g. through FormData object, but unfortunately it is not supported by all/old browsers.
trans-unit.target: 使用XHR2，支持通过AJAX上传文件。例如，通过 FormData 对象，但是不幸的是，所有/旧的浏览器都不支持它。

trans-unit.source: Yes you can, just use javascript to get the file, making sure you read the file as a data URL. Parse out the stuff before base64 to actually get the base 64 encoded data and then if you are using php or really any back end language you can decode the base 64 data and save into a file like shown below
trans-unit.target: 是的,你可以,只要用javascript来获取文件,确保你把文件读成一个数据URL。将base64之前的东西解析出来,得到base64编码的数据,然后如果你使用的是php或者其他任何后端语言,你可以将base64数据解码后保存到一个文件中,如下图所示

trans-unit.source: You can check further details here.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在此处查看更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: You can upload file, without refreshing page by using IFrame.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 IFrame 上传文件，而无需刷新页面。

trans-unit.source: You can use method ajaxSubmit as follow :) when you select a file that need upload to server, form be submit to server :)
trans-unit.target: 当你选择一个需要上传到服务器的文件时,你可以使用ajaxSubmit方法如下:),当你选择一个需要上传到服务器的文件时,表单会被提交到服务器上。)

trans-unit.source: You do NOT need to set header "Content-Type" to "multipart/form-data" browser will set it automatically
trans-unit.target: 您不需要将头的 "内容类型 "设置为 "multipartform-data",浏览器会自动设置。

trans-unit.source: and the page loads.
trans-unit.target: 和页面加载。

trans-unit.source: edit: Note contentype and process data You can simply use this to upload files via Ajax...... submit input cannot be outside form element :)
trans-unit.target: 编辑:注意contententype和处理数据 你可以简单地通过Ajax上传文件...........提交的输入不能在表单元素之外。)
